Title: Reunion
Genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Tonya Kong (story editor), Sarah Streicher (staff writer)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Vincent D'Onofrio
Plot: Dex tries to run his prey to ground, Nadeem's conscience kicks in, and Fisk looks to recover a gift from Vanessa seized during his incarceration.
